meanings.definition: The state or quality of being airtight.
meanings.sent1: The airtightness of the jar kept the cookies fresh for a long time.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the airtightness of the windows to keep the cold air out.
meanings.sent3: The airtightness of the balloon made it impossible to blow up.
meanings.sent4: The airtightness of the secret vault ensured the treasures remained safe.
meanings.sent5: The airtightness of the submarine was crucial for its deep-sea exploration.
